lines.text: Looking back you never regret the ones you did, only the ones you didn't.
[On being a spurned middle aged lover]
I'm not going to get another chance.
What can I say. I'm a bad man. But sometimes it's great fun to be bad.
You're not a bad man. If that made men bad, we'd all be lost.
She certainly has a sweet lookin' little body on her, but you oughtta stick to fuckin' grownups, dumbass.
